name: Blitz Blotz
description: One would think that there's nothing difficult to move a small circle threw some other moving little circles? "I can do it all day long!" you'll say. So try it. Is it so hard to watch several circles of various colors? Failure? Again? Well, you're just a slowpoke! Sharpen your skill in controlling of several multicolored circles and who knows, your record may become something you can make a vaunt to you friends.
